rules.name: Rule_1_Success
rules.conditionLogic: (1 or 2 or 3 or 4) and (5 and 6 and 7 and 8 and 9 and 10 and 11 and 12)
rules.label: Rule 1 Success

rules.name: Rule_2_Success
rules.conditionLogic: (1 or 2 or 3 or 4 or 5) and ((6 and 7) or 8)
rules.label: Rule 2 Success

rules.name: Rule_3_Success
rules.conditionLogic: (1 or 2 or 3 or 4 or 5) and (6 and 7)
rules.label: Rule 3 Success

rules.name: Rule_4_Success
rules.conditionLogic: (1 or 2 or 3 or 4 or 5) and (6 and 7)
rules.label: Rule 4 Success

rules.name: Rule_5_Success
rules.conditionLogic: (1 or 2 or 3 or 4 or 5) and (6 and 7)
rules.label: Rule 5 Success

rules.name: Rule_6_Success
rules.conditionLogic: (1 or 2 or 3 or 4 or 5) and (6 and 7)
rules.label: Rule 6 Success

rules.name: Rule_7_Success
rules.conditionLogic: (1 or 2 or 3 or 4 or 5) and (6 and (7 AND 8))
rules.label: Rule 7 Success

rules.name: Rule_9_Success
rules.conditionLogic: (1 or 2 or 3 or 4) and ((5 or 6) Or (7 and 8))

rightValue.stringValue: 1 - Is capable of providing informed consent

rules.label: Rule 9 Success

formulas.name: is_Selected_1_Does_Meet_Criteria_Eligibility
formulas.expression: ISPICKVAL({!$Record.I_determine_that_the_patient__c},'1 - Does meet the criteria for MAiD and natural death IS reasonably foreseeable')
